word: Don't Censure or Condemn--You are not even to allow yourself to think unkindly of them, much less to climb upon the judgment seat and censure or condemn your brethren, when you may be yourself, in many respects, more deserving of censure than they.  Your work is bearing the inspection of God.--Letter 21, 1888 pp. 10, 11 (Oct. 14, 1888 to Bro.  Butler).
